column4: heyas. i just installed ubuntu hoary from the CD. and am reading ubuntu guide. after installing, i just updated my sources.list from ubuntuguide website and did apt-get update. but i get an error with the nerim.net entry, what do i do to correct it so the error goes away?
Don't worry about auth warnings
ok
System > Administration > Users and Groups
ok
the latest hoary Cd. i downloaded it yesterday.
when did you install?
About two months ago...
Dunno why the message has changed... maybe they've forgotten to edit the deb installer text in one area :)
ok.
Oooh! Did you drop into the advanced installer?
yes
That explains it... I should file a bug about that for Breezy
oh. i did'nt know auto install and expert install were that different :(
expert install is very close to the original debian installer I believe
It really is an expert install
gtk2 is a lot faster now
Should be even faster once its hardware accelerated
no idea. i dont even know how slow it was earlier :D
gnome-look.org, art.gnome.org
